smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'BaseActivity' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ApkDetailsFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'DetailsSource' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function humanReadableName appears to be too complex.
The function extractMainInfo appears to be too complex.
The function extractHumanName appears to be too complex.
The function onOptionsItemSelected appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class DetailsSource is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function extractFeatures is nested too deeply.

smells.name: EmptyClassBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: The class or object  ListDisplayer is empty.
The class or object  ListActivity is empty.

smells.name: EmptyDefaultConstructor
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: An empty default constructor can be removed.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: PrintStackTrace
smells.description: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'AppListAdapter.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'AppAdapter'.

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (it is AppInfoHeader) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it is AppInfoHeader
Parentheses in (it.mask and filter) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.mask and filter
Parentheses in (it.mask and filter) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.mask and filter
Parentheses in (applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM
Parentheses in (applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_DEBUGGABLE) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_DEBUGGABLE
Parentheses in (applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Parentheses in (applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_LARGE_HEAP) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: applicationInfo.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_LARGE_HEAP
Parentheses in (it.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM
Parentheses in (flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM != 0
Parentheses in (flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_DEBUGGABLE != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_DEBUGGABLE != 0
Parentheses in (flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_LARGE_HEAP != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: flags and ApplicationInfo.FLAG_LARGE_HEAP != 0

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.
